# speechRecognitionTaskFinishedReadingAudio(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate when the task is no longer accepting new audio input, even if final processing is in progress.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func speechRecognitionTaskFinishedReadingAudio(_ task: SFSpeechRecognitionTask)
```

## Parameters

- **task**: The speech recognition task (an [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/SFSpeechRecognitionTask] object) that represents the request.

## Tracking task progress

- **speechRecognitionDidDetectSpeech(_:)**: Tells the delegate when the task first detects speech in the source audio.
